gsm.reporting: Good Statistical Monitoring Reporting

Source: R/gsm.reporting-package.R
gsm.reporting-package.Rd

The Good Statistical Monitoring or 'gsm' suite of R packages provides a framework for statistical data monitoring. 'gsm.reporting' provides workflows to generate the reporting data model needed to generate reports.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://gilead-biostats.github.io/gsm.reporting/

  • https://github.com/Gilead-BioStats/gsm.reporting/
